text: Kang Yi-seok (born November 11, 1998) is a South Korean actor. Kang began his career as a child actor, and has starred in television series such as Mr. Goodbye (2006), First Wives' Club (2007), Five Fingers (2012) and Ugly Alert (2013). He joined the Marine Corps on May 28, 2018 for his mandatory military enlistment and was discharged on March 8, 2020. == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable" style="width:600px" |- ! width=10|Year !
